scripts.start: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.utils:disassemble: tsc && cd dist/ && node occasionalUtils.js disassemble
scripts.utils:apy: tsc && cd dist/ && node occasionalUtils.js apy
scripts.utils:donationFile: tsc && cd dist/ && node occasionalUtils.js donationFile
scripts.debug: npm run build && cd dist/ && node index.js --debug
scripts.tester: npm run build && cd dist/ && node testerHelper.js
scripts.restart: npm run build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js
